name: 3.6. Environmental Rules
content:
@Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.XOJpjqmBzwE4R4n0]{(Index) Environment}

@Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.cWT946eZ614UBXMT]{3.6. Environmental Rules}

Source PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 442

Environmental hazards specific to one kind of terrain are described in the Wilderness section. Environmental hazards common to more than one setting are detailed below.
